triage.root_cause: os.fchmod is not available on Windows, causing AttributeError when calling TodoStorage.save()
risk_points: Primary: Any Windows user calling save() will get AttributeError
Secondary: Existing tests don't mock Windows behavior

fix.approach: Add hasattr check before calling os.fchmod
